vote(bytes[],address).details: - more voters -> higher the gas - this would be triggered when a voter casts their vote via grant explorer - can be invoked by the round - supports ERC20 and Native token transfer

Voted(address,uint256,address,address,ad.notice: Emitted when a new vote is sent

init().notice: Invoked by RoundImplementation on creation to set the round for which the voting contracts is to be used

vote(bytes[],address).notice: Invoked by RoundImplementation which allows a voted to cast weighted votes to multiple grants during a round

userdoc.notice: Allows voters to cast multiple weighted votes to grants with one transaction This is inspired from BulkCheckout documented over at: https://github.com/gitcoinco/BulkTransactions/blob/master/contracts/BulkCheckout.sol Emits event upon every transfer.
